TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProcessModelSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class ProcessModelSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) Web 服务器上的 ASP.NET 进程模型设置。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET process model settings on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `processModel` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `processModel` section of a configuration file. 类控制 ASP.NET 工作进程的各个方面，包括其生存期、一次创建的实例数、运行时所使用的安全标识，以及 CLR 线程池用于处理请求的大小。The class controls various aspects of the ASP.NET worker process, including its lifetime, the number of instances created at a time, what security identity it runs under, and the size of the CLR thread pool to service requests. 当 ASP.NET 在本机模式下的 IIS 6 下运行时，ASP.NET 将使用 IIS 6 进程模型，并忽略本部分中的大多数设置。When ASP.NET is running under IIS 6 in native mode, ASP.NET uses the IIS 6 process model and ignores most settings in this section. 使用 IIS 管理用户界面 (UI) 来配置这些属性。Use the IIS administration user interface (UI) to configure those properties. ASP.NET 仍使用以下属性，这些属性可通过配置文件进行配置： 、、、、 和 。ASP.NET still uses the following properties, which can be configured through the configuration file: , , , , , and . `processModel`部分无法使用受保护的配置功能进行加密，因为它是由 ASP.NET ISAPI 扩展使用的。The `processModel` section cannot be encrypted using the protected-configuration feature or tools because it is consumed by the ASP.NET ISAPI extension. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为部分的多个属性指定值 `processModel` ，该部分也可以作为类的成员进行访问 。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `processModel` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为节指定值 `processModel` 。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `processModel` section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例 。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoConfig { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoConfig : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为 ASP.NET 应用程序自动配置 ASP.NET 性能设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ASP.NET performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications.

value.span: 如果为 ASP.NET 应用程序自动配置性能设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 值设置为，则将 `false` 使用显式 Web.config 值来确定 ASP.NET 应用程序的性能配置。If the value is set to `false`, explicit Web.config values are used to determine performance configuration for the ASP.NET application. 如果 将值设置为 `true` ，则会为 ASP.NET 应用程序自动配置性能设置。If the value is set to `true`, the performance settings are automatically configured for the ASP.NET application. 此 值 `true` 在 Machine.config 文件中显式设置为。The value is explicitly set to `true` in the Machine.config file. 默认代码值设置为 `false` 。The default code value is set to `false`. 如果 从 Machine.config 中移除该值，将使用显式设置，而不是自动配置的设置。If the value is removed from Machine.config, the explicit settings are used instead of the auto-configured settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ClientConnectedCheck { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ClientConnectedCheck : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示请求在队列中的保留时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how long a request is left in the queue.

value.span: 指示排队时间的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the queuing time.
The default value is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定在 ASP.NET 执行客户端连接检查之前，请求排队的时间。This property specifies how long a request is queued before ASP.NET performs a client connected check. > [!NOTE] > 如果该时间间隔在请求仍处于排队状态时过期，则在将请求传递到 ASP.NET 工作进程以进行处理之前，将执行客户端连接检查。If the interval expires while the request is still queued, a client connected check is done before passing the request over to the ASP.NET worker process for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问和修改 属性。The following code example shows how to access and modify the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel ComAuthenticationLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 DCOM 安全性的身份验证级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for DCOM security.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性值设置为 ，DCOM 将使用其常规安全协商算法来确定身份验证级别。When this property value is set to , DCOM determines the authentication level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm. 分配给此属性的默认值为 Machine.config 文件中指定的 。The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is . 在这种情况下，仅当客户端与服务器建立关系时，DCOM 才会对客户端的凭据进行身份验证。In this case, DCOM authenticates the credentials of the client only when the client establishes a relationship with the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel ComImpersonationLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 COM 安全性的身份验证级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for COM security.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性值设置为 ，DCOM 将使用其常规安全协商算法来确定模拟级别。When this property value is set to , DCOM determines the impersonation level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm. 分配给此属性的默认值为 Machine.config 文件中指定的 。The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is . 在这种情况下，服务器进程可以在代表客户端的同时模拟客户端的安全上下文。In this case, the server process can impersonate the client's security context while acting on behalf of the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#22)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CpuMask { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CpuMask : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示多处理器服务器上哪些处理器符合运行 ASP.NET 进程的条件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which processors on a multiprocessor server are eligible to run ASP.NET processes.

value.span: 表示要应用的位模式的数字。

span.span: The number representing the bit pattern to apply.
The default value is 0xFFFFFFFF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值指定位模式，它指示有资格运行 ASP.NET 线程的 cpu。The value specifies a bit pattern that indicates the CPUs eligible to run ASP.NET threads. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则会将 工作进程限制为符合条件的 cpu 数。If the property is set to `true`, the limits worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs. 允许的最大工作进程数等于 Cpu 数。The maximum allowed number of worker processes is equal to the number of CPUs. 默认情况下，所有 Cpu 都处于启用状态，ASP.NET 为每个 CPU 启动一个进程。By default, all CPUs are enabled and ASP.NET launches one process for each CPU. 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则 忽略该属性，并且仅运行一个工作进程。If the property is set to `false`, the attribute is ignored and only one worker process will run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用此进程模型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the process model is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用此进程模型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the process model is enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 ASP.NET 是否托管在外部工作进程中。The property specifies whether ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process. 如果 为 `true` ，则 ASP.NET 托管在外部工作进程中; 否则，它会直接在 Inetinfo.exe 中运行。If is `true`, ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process; otherwise, it runs directly in Inetinfo.exe. > [!NOTE] > 不建议在 Inetinfo.exe 中运行 ASP.NET，因为这涉及到在本地系统安全上下文中运行应用程序。Running ASP.NET in Inetinfo.exe is not recommended, because this involves running the application in the Local System security context. 当 ASP.NET 在 Internet Information Services (IIS) 6 本机模式下运行时，将忽略此设置，因此，通常没有理由将其设置为 `false` 。When ASP.NET runs in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6 native mode, this setting is ignored, so there is usually no reason to set it to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan IdleTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.IdleTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示了一个非活动时间期限，在该期限后，ASP.NET 将自动结束辅助进程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the period of inactivity after which ASP.NET automatically ends the worker process.

value.span: 指示空闲时间的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the idle time.

value.span: 默认值为 Infinite，它对应于 。

span.span: The default value is Infinite, which corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当达到属性值时， (退回) 重新启动工作进程 。The worker process is restarted (bounced) when the property value is reached. 默认情况下，只有两个条件导致进程弹跳：进程超出了允许的内存限制，或进程超过了允许的排队请求数。By default, only two conditions cause the process to bounce: the process exceeds the allowed memory limit, or the process exceeds the allowed number of requests that can be queued. 可以向默认条件添加其他条件。You can add other conditions to the default ones. 例如，可以使用 属性来限制工作进程处于空闲状态的时间。For example, you can use the property to limit the time the worker process is idle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel LogLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示记录到事件日志中的事件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the event types to be logged to the event log.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过正确使用此属性，可以筛选系统可以记录的错误。By using this property correctly, you can filter the errors the system can log. 了解应用程序的故障或瓶颈后，您可能需要设计一个可缩小您感兴趣的错误范围的策略。After you have an idea of the application's malfunctions or bottlenecks, you might want to devise a strategy that narrows the range of errors you are interested in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxAppDomains { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxAppDomains : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个进程中所允许最大应用程序域数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.

value.span: 一个进程中所允许的最大应用程序域数。

span.span: The maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 超过了阈值，则在新的应用程序域必须启动的情况下，将关闭使用最少的应用程序域。If the threshold is exceeded, the least-used application domain is shut down if a new application domain must start. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#27)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxIOThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxIOThreads : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 CLR 线程池中每个 CPU 的最大 I/O 线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
The maximum number of threads.
The default is 20.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值 必须等于或大于 "配置" 部分中的设置 `httpRuntime` 。The value of must be equal to or greater than the setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section. 可以通过使用 属性和属性分别设置工作线程和 i/o 线程的数目，来控制 CPU 利用率 。You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the property and the property respectively. 这两种类型的线程之间的差异在于，后者绑定到 i/o 对象（如流或管道），前者是传统的无限制线程。The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads. 对于 Internet Information Services (IIS) 版本6.0 及更高版本，ASP.NET 将处理工作线程上的请求。For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and later, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads. 这是因为 ASP.NET 在 IIS 中集成。This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS. 这些线程是从属于应用程序的进程范围 CLR 线程池获取的。These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application. > [!NOTE] > 通常，允许的线程的默认值足以保持 CPU 使用率高。Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high. 如果由于某种原因而导致应用程序运行缓慢，可能会等待外部资源，因此可以尝试将线程数增加到小于100的值。If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWorkerThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxWorkerThreads : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 CLR 线程池中每个 CPU 的最大辅助线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
The maximum number of threads.
The default is 20.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值 必须等于或大于 "配置" 部分中的设置 `httpRuntime` 。The value of must be equal to or greater than the setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section. 可以通过使用 属性和属性分别设置工作线程和 i/o 线程的数目，从而对 CPU 使用率进行一些控制 。You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the property and, the property, respectively. 这两种类型的线程之间的差异在于，后者绑定到 i/o 对象（如流或管道），前者是传统的无限制线程。The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads. 对于 Internet Information Services (IIS) 版本6.0 及更高版本，ASP.NET 将处理工作线程上的请求。For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and higher, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads. 这是因为 ASP.NET 在 IIS 中集成。This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS. 这些线程是从属于应用程序的进程范围 CLR 线程池获取的。These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application. > [!NOTE] > 通常，允许的线程的默认值足以保持 CPU 使用率高。Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high. 如果由于某种原因而导致应用程序运行缓慢，可能会等待外部资源，因此可以尝试将线程数增加到小于100的值。If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所允许的最大内存大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum allowed memory size.

value.span: 占系统总内存的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total system memory.
The default is 60 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内存大小以系统总内存的百分比表示。The memory size is expressed as a percentage of the total system memory. 这是在 ASP.NET 重新启动 (弹跳) 之前，辅助进程可使用的内存量。This is the amount of memory a worker process can consume before ASP.NET restarts (bounces) it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.

value.span: CLR 线程池中每个 CPU 的最少辅助线程数

span.span: The minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示为 Windows 标识使用的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the password to use for the Windows identity.
The password to use.
The default value is AutoGenerate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须与属性一起使用 。The property must be used with the property. 如果存在这些属性值，则会导致辅助进程与配置的 Windows 标识一起运行。When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingFrequency { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PingFrequency : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示时间间隔的值，每隔一个该时间间隔 ISAPI 扩展会对辅助进程使用 ping 命令以确定其是否在运行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval at which the ISAPI extension pings the worker process to determine whether it is running.
The defining the time interval.
The default is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在间隔过期后未运行，则重新启动工作进程 (退回) 。The worker process is restarted (bounced) if it is not running after the interval has expired. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PingTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示时间间隔的值，在该时间间隔之后没有响应的辅助进程将被重新启动。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval after which a non-responsive worker process is restarted.
The defining the time interval.
The default is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ISAPI 扩展按间隔对工作进程执行 ping 操作 。The ISAPI extensions ping the worker process at the interval. 如果工作进程未在间隔内响应 ，则重新启动该进程。If the worker process does not respond within the interval, the process is restarted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RequestLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在回收辅助进程之前所允许的请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed before a worker process is recycled.
The number of allowed requests.
The default is Infinite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超过了请求数，ASP.NET 会自动启动一个新的工作进程来代替当前的工作进程。If the number of requests is exceeded, ASP.NET automatically launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RequestQueueLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示队列中所允许的请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed in the queue.

value.span: 队列中所允许的请求数。

span.span: The number of requests allowed to be queued.
The default is 5000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超出了队列中允许的请求数，ASP.NET 将开始向新请求返回 "503-服务器太忙" 错误。If the number of requests allowed in the queue is exceeded, ASP.NET begins returning "503 - Server Too Busy" errors to new requests. 达到此限制时，系统将在异常情况下运行。When this limit is reached, the system is operating in abnormal conditions. 这可能是故障的症状，可能只是高负载。This might be a symptom of a malfunction or, maybe, just high load. 重新启动 (弹跳) 工作进程可能成为阻止进一步问题的唯一方法。Restarting (bouncing) the worker process might become the only way to prevent further problems. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#10)]

member this.ResponseDeadlockInterval : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示辅助进程的响应间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval for the worker process to respond.
The defining the interval.
The default is 3 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有排队的请求，并且如果在定义的时间间隔内没有响应，则会重新启动此过程 。The process is restarted if there are queued requests and if there has not been a response during the time interval that is defined by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#17)]

member this.ResponseRestartDeadlockInterval : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 不再使用。

span.span: No longer used.
Not applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不再由 ASP.NET 使用，提供它只是为了实现向后兼容性。This property is no longer used by ASP.NET and is provided for backward compatibility only. 如果配置文件中已存在配置错误，则不会导致配置错误。It will not cause a configuration error if it is already present in a configuration file. 发生死锁情况时的所有回收现在都是由属性控制的 。All recycling in the event of a deadlock condition is now controlled by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RestartQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RestartQueueLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在等待新的辅助进程开始处理请求时被 ISAPI 排队的最大请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests queued by the ISAPI while waiting for a new worker process to start handling the requests.
The number of requests queued.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过此限制时，客户端请求将收到503错误，直到工作进程准备就绪。When this limit is exceeded, a client request will receive a 503 error until the worker process is ready. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示文件的值，当发生致命错误时必须使用该文件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the file whose content must be used when a fatal error occurs.

value.span: 发生致命错误时使用的文件的路径。

span.span: The path of the file used when a fatal error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用其内容而不是默认的服务器不可用消息的文件。The file whose content is used instead of the default Server Unavailable message. 文件位置可以是相对路径或绝对文件路径。The file location can be a relative or an absolute file path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ShutdownTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ShutdownTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示允许的关闭辅助进程的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time allowed for the worker process to shut down.
The defining the interval.
The default is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定允许工作进程正常关闭的分钟数。This property specifies the number of minutes allowed for the worker process to shut itself down gracefully. 当超时到期时，ASP.NET 会强行关闭工作进程。When the timeout expires, ASP.NET shuts down the worker process forcibly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Timeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 ASP.NET 启动新的辅助进程之前的分钟数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of minutes until ASP.NET launches a new worker process.
The defining the interval.
The default is Infinite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 启动一个新的辅助进程来代替当前的工作进程。ASP.NET launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UserName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值为 Windows 标识指示用户名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the user name for a Windows identity.
The user name.
The default value is Machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在，则 定义不同于默认进程的 Windows 标识。If present, the defines a Windows identity different from that of the default process. 此标识用于运行 ASP.NET 工作进程。This identity is used to run the ASP.NET worker process. 默认情况下， 设置为特殊值计算机，该进程将在安装 ASP.NET 时自动创建的名为 ASPNET 的用户帐户下运行。By default, is set to the special value Machine, and the process runs under a user account named ASPNET that is created automatically when ASP.NET is installed. 属性必须与属性一起使用 。The property must be used with the property. 如果存在这些属性值，则会导致辅助进程与配置的 Windows 标识一起运行。When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity. > [!NOTE] > 如果 将属性设置为 "系统"，并使用 "密码自动生成"，则会定义一个作为管理帐户运行进程的实体，并允许在该进程下运行的所有 ASP.NET 用户代码具有完全管理权限。If the property is set to System, with the password AutoGenerate, it defines an entity that runs the process as an administrative account and allows all ASP.NET user code running under the process to have full administrative privileges. 因此，请密切注意这种情况下允许的权限。So, pay close attention to this case, for the permissions allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WebGarden { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.WebGarden : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值允许可用的 CPU 运行辅助进程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value enabling the available CPUs to run the worker processes.

value.span: 如果使用 将辅助进程映射到符合条件的 CPU 数，则为 ；如果忽略 ，则为 。

span.span: , if is used to map the worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs; if is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须与属性一起使用 。The property must be used with the property. 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则 忽略该属性，并且仅运行一个工作进程。If the property is set to `false`, the attribute is ignored and only one worker process runs. > [!NOTE] > 多处理器 Web 服务器称为 "Web 园"。A multiprocessor Web server is called a Web garden. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#24)]
